tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Do not take this class. It is extremely boring and you have to do 12 hours of volunteer work. There\'s homework due like every class and it\'s always essays. Way too much work for just a GE class.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She is a stress-free teacher. 2 Midterms and one final. Not intimidating because the study guide covers 99% of the questions from the exams; rest are peripheral questions. Five MAJOR assignments, most of which are only 250-word easy assignments ;). One 800 word research paper towards end of semester. Extra credit. No stress AT ALL for an easy A!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: She is the most sweetest teacher EVER! she doesnt even try to be funny but she makes jokes that ARE funny. Mid semester she had surgery so a different teacher taught for her class. I really liked her. TAKE HER CLASS!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Okay She DOES NOT GIVE YOU a Cheat Sheet for the tests. As for the tests in this class. You DO NOT get keep them in order to prepare for the other tests. You have go into her office hours or after class to look them. Overall, I have learned a lot from her and it was sad that she didn\'t get to teach for the rest of the semester. She got switched!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Professor Reisenauer is AWESOME! She is super sweet and I really enjoyed her class. She gives study guides for her tests and lets you use a cheat sheet on her final. Her tests are based on her lectures and she posts the lectures on D2L. Love her! Take this class, she is amazing!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: BEST PROF EVER!!!!!! she\'s willing to help you do well and pass her class. no need to worry about failing her class. her notes are always posted online. she always give out study guides and they are all straight out from the notes and books. SERIOUSLY NO NEED TO WORRY THT YOU WILL FAIL HER CLASS...

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: TAKE THIS PROFESSOR! She is super approachable and nice. No textbook needed. Just study her powerpoint slides very well and you will do great in the class. She gives extra credit opportunities! One big community service project but it really gives you real life experiences that relate to the course. Easy A if you put in effort.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: This class is one of the easiest As I\'ve gotten. Had over 100% going into the final. Study her slides and do all of the assignments and it\'s a breeze. She can be kind of dry and boring but is very clear and helpful.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: prof. reisenaur<3 sigh, she is great! i love her. she\'s super sweet and is very understanding. make sure you do the activities, the community service (i chose sacred heart), and study off ALL the lecture slides for exams (i hardly looked at the study guide). she gives heaps of extra credit too. definitely take this class and help solve poverty!!!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: For an elective class, there was a lot of outside work to do. Several writing assignments, one midterm, and one final. Just study her lecture notes and it will be an easy A. No book needed for this class. And do the 12 hrs of community service!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: This professor is a nice & the lectures are interesting if you\'re in to that kind of stuff. The class is just right for general education requirements. If anything, it makes you more aware of what\'s going on in other parts of the world. Be sure to sign up for an organization ASAP for your volunteer hours. I\'m happy to have had her class.
